templates.name: Can I make an exchange?
templates.content: At this time, we do not accept online exchange requests. Please process your return and place a new order.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact our customer service team at 800-452-2678, Monday - Friday 9am - 11pm, and Saturday & Sunday 10am-9pm. Our team is happy to look into this for you!

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us near you here: https://www.lacoste.com/us/stores?country=stores.lacoste.com

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us via this link: https://www.lacoste.com/us/contactus Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://hosted-pages.id.me/lacoste-military

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.lacoste.com/us/FAQ.html?category=C03&question=ka34H000000LjUEQA0

templates.name: Do you ship to PO Boxes?
templates.content: I'm afraid we don't ship to P.O. Boxes.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: https://www.lacoste.com/us/contactus Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to contact us via this link: https://www.lacoste.com/us/contactus Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Do you offer free returns?
templates.content: Yes, all returns are free!

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You need to register your return using the "Register My Return" option found on your account page or "Shipment Confirmation" e-mail. Please follow all prompts once you have started your return process.

templates.name: Do you offer customizations?
templates.content:
Monogramming is offered on select polos only. Please note that monogrammed items are personalized as individual, they are considered final sale and may not be exchanged or returned.

These items are considered custom order items and are also non-cancellable. Please add up to five additional business days to your standard order shipping time when choosing to monogram your item.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-800-452-2678 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Happy to help! Our clothes generally run true to size. Would you mind sharing your usual size?

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1 business day and once shipped it will take 3-5 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/lacoste/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/Lacoste/?brand_redir=288214761363906

templates.name: Holiday Discounts
templates.content: Thanks for reaching out! You are subscribed and will receive updates about the latest offers. You can always check out our site at https://www.lacoste.com/us/ for additional information!

templates.name: Where do you deliver?
templates.content: Orders placed on our Lacoste online shop may be delivered anywhere in the continental US, Alaska, and Hawaii. Please note that we do not currently deliver to P.O. Boxes, international addresses, or APO/FPO addresses. Hope this helps.

templates.name: What is your refund process?
templates.content: Refunds will be credited to the original form of payment. Please, allow 2 weeks from the shipping date for your account to be credited and 1-2 billing cycles for the refund to appear on your credit card statement. All items not complying with our return policy will be returned to you without a refund.
